page.title: 18Survey of childrens games
page.content: We surveyed the whole first year at Stanley High School. Here are the top ten games in order of preference.1.Tig, 2.Football,3.Tennis, 4.Cricket, 5.Hide and Seek,6.Various ball games,7.Britishbulldogs,8.Walley, 9.Rounders,10.Monopoly. These are only the top ten games, there were many more.The top game is described below TIG had 129 votes, the object of this game is to have as many players as you want.Someone is to be'it'(tigger). Everybody runs away and the tigger counts to ten, after he or she has counted the tigger runs after them.If one person is caught that person is it.Another form of tig is where the person counts to ten and runs after everyone.When a person is caught three times that person is it.
